title: Hello!
content:
I'm back! Hong Kong and Cambodia were loads of fun. I have so many adventures and pictures to share! My computer/camera/photo transfer decided to crap out on me today, so stay tuned as I (hopefully) get all my pictures uploaded and sorted. I have so many things to blog about that I'm going to try and post everyday for the next week or two.

While it's been hard getting back into the swing of things, I was so excited to come home to these mini Le Creusets my friend got me as a house warming gift. They will be so perfect for my next batch of French onion soup -- thanks Preet!
